attributes.action: dissolve parliament and call a general election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We, the people of the UK believe that parliament and its members no longer has the confidence of the people to effectively rule free from corruption.
We therefore call for a general election to give the people of the UK chance to change our country for the better via democratic vote.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
